website_summaries.verdict: Monitor up to 6 different cuts of meat at once with this durable thermometer.
pros: Works with a temperature range of 32 to 572 degrees Fahrenheit
Comes with 6 probes and 11 customizable presets for different meats and doneness
cons: Probe wire length is only 40 inches, which can be limiting if you're using all 6 probes with one unit

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Buy
customer_reviews.text: My husband is in love with these! We wanted some nice thermometers to monitor the prime ribs we were smoking and these did not disappoint. We have been able to close the grill lid and not damage the thermometers so far. The bluetooth app is by far the most impressive thing about this product. You can label each thermometer on your phone and it has cooking temperature pre-sets. We have been able to sit from the inside of our home and simultaneously grill fish and hamburgers or four prime rib roasts at once. This really ups the convenience factor of grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Christina!

customer_reviews.title: I've been wanting something like this for a long time!
customer_reviews.text: This wireless meat thermometer is exactly what I've been wanting, an is perfect for smokers (the meat kind). I've used it several times, and especially like it when smoking pork butts. So far this thing has worked exceptionally well...and using it with my Samsung mobile phone app. No problems whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Dadmin

customer_reviews.title: Shop Around
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work fine but they should sell a case to keep all of the probes together. I bought a 'pencil case' from school supplies and it's OK. Also, two days after I bought this I saw the same thing from another company for 20% less.... feel kind of ripped off
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J. Dignan

customer_reviews.title: Best system available
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have a smoker and use it all the time waited buying a thermometer until I found one that had all the conveniences that I was looking for. This did not disappoint. I smoke multiple types of meats at a time this system let's me know when each piece is done to the correct temps . Love the bluetooth technology. I get all the temps for all 6 probes on my smartphone ,if I stay to far with my phone it let's me know by a audio alert. You wont be disappointed best thermometer on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: mark brown

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Product
customer_reviews.text: I have a very high quality smoker and my family loves smoked meat. I have tried 4 other thermometers and none was very accurate. Getting an accurate tempture reading is very important. The meat thermometer is by far a superior thermometer. It's easy to use, gives very accurate temp. readings and the remote works extremely well. On top of all this, it was the best price of all of the thermometers I have. The other 4 are going in the trash, a waste of money. It is all I need.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria H. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: it is pretty easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Once you read the directions, it is pretty easy to setup and use. The wireless remote display is pretty cool to boot. You don't need to use it but hey what the hell ! It's a great way to really know the temperature of your grill or smoker. In fact, it's critical for consistent cooking. I especially like the duel temps - one for the smoker / grill and the other for internal temperature of the meat. A+++
customer_reviews.author: ghai c lu

customer_reviews.title: Stopped pairing with phone - can't set alarms or get remote reads
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to use at first, worked fine. Then after about a month it stopped pairing with my phone. Sent two emails to customer service, they've ignored both. The reason I bought it was to get the connection to my phone. Now that it won't pair, can't set alarms at all. The thermometer works, but can't set alarms and can't remote reading. Also need to be careful with the probes. If the silicone handles get too close to the grill, they melt at normal grilling temps. Need to ust some sort of stand to keep the silicone handles far enough away from the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde Siverd, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thermometer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer! We do a lot of grilling and smoking so we thought we would give this thermometer a try! It is so awesome, with the Bluetooth connection I can work on other side dishes inside the house and monitor my meat outside without having to go back and forth to check it. I recommend this thermometer and seller, it arrived quickly and in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: Failing device after third use
customer_reviews.text: After third time using this thermometer two of the probes read over 300 degrees no matter what the temp. One probe won’t go over 140 degrees. I can’t recommend this thermometer. Have reached out to Mfg for replacement. We shall see
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not in Fahrenheit!!
customer_reviews.text: Did not know that this thermometer was in celcious and not Fahrenheit. Very disappointed as we have to really pay attention. Will I recommend it, not really. Being able to keep up with different meats is great but we have to keep up in celcious.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mostly good thermometer set.
customer_reviews.text: I really like how easy this is to use. Basically plug and play. You have pre-sets for most of your goods with the recommended minimum temps. Blue toothed to my phone with no issue. I have used this about a dozen times now and only have 1 issue. My blue probe reads about 40 degrees higher than the rest on my probes. (This just started) This would have a 5 star rating if this probe wasn't acting up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Temps are VERY accurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my brother in law, who is not a grill master by any means. We did a 14# prime rib for Christmas and once we got the gas grill temp dialed in, it was spot on. We ended up using one of the probes as an internal temp gauge for the grill. It was very easy to use and he loved the app. Very easy to set up and install. Range was about 50' from where the grill was through a brick wall to wherever he went in the house. He was very happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Betteed

customer_reviews.title: With this we are like a pit masters!
customer_reviews.text: I love monitoring how fast it is cooking. I love the alarms! I also purchased an additional piece that allows me to measure the temperature of the grill (sits just above the grill). Having this information allows me duplicate it in the future if it turned out really really good.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Okay product
customer_reviews.text: A couple of the prongs quit working right away. If the other 4 keep working, then I would say it's a great product. It does work well otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Cobian

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for bbq
customer_reviews.text: Works very well in my smoker for trying to keep track of pork temps, also great for grilling chicken to make sure it’s cooked all the way. The Bluetooth feature is especially helpful for long range bbq, don’t have to keep running outside to check on the pork/ribs/beef temp. The distance range isn’t huge, but it works from my living room with the smoker in the back yard just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Chew

customer_reviews.title: Turned on once then it never worked again
customer_reviews.text: The heading speaks for itself. Never even got to try it out. Came on, I paired it with my phone, then turned it off. I never came on again. I tried many new batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Logan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about a month.
customer_reviews.text: Total garbage. Worked for about 6 weeks and now it's a paper weight. I was gentle and careful. I used it on the grill maybe 4 times and a few more in the oven. Then 1 day it just wouldn't turn on. I tried fresh batteries and still nothing. Lasted just over the 30 day return.
customer_reviews.author: Japdawap

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for indoors and out!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son-in-law, but I have been to his house for dinner several times while he was using it. The food was cooked just right with no guess work. This avoids the constant lifting the lid to check. You can be talking with your guests and still keeping an eye on dinner cooking. I am thinking of getting one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Received this just in time to smoke chicken and pork butts. Fantastic thermometer!! so easy to download the app and so easy to use. Only mix up was I should have purchased the clips to use it for ambient temp as the other probes I own are much thicker and not compatible. I have since ordered the other clamps I recommend this product 100%.
customer_reviews.author: James Tramontozzi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Well it’s too late to return it so I’ll probably toss it. One of the silicon ends got crispy in a well controlled 350* pit and 2 of 6 probes were way off on the temps they kept. Both said the meat was 130* within 3 minutes of putting them on the grill. Not even worth the free prime shipping in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Prime was here in 2 days. Put batteries in downloaded app. It connected done. Later that night hooked up 2 probes. Started app. Had temps on different chicken breasts. Was surprised how different the temps were on a thick one and thin one. Anyway they both got to set point close to same time. Alarm sounded for each one! Awesome new pellet feed bbq and temp probes. I now bbq from my couch!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: this thermometer works great. i gave it to my husband as a birthday gift and it gets used a few times a week. Its perfect!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Durability definitely an issue
customer_reviews.text: I use these regularly for roasts and occasionally grilling, never exceeding 400F. The majority of the time they don’t ever go over 225 when I slow roast. Yet within a couple months 3 of them have become useless and show temperatures around a hundred degrees higher than actuality. The main console and the app work fine, and the probes themselves seem to be accurate when they work. But you’d think a probe designed to withstand closer to 700 would last much longer at a fraction of that temp.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Elevate your cooking
customer_reviews.text: Work without the app but the app adds a great deal of value. Much harder to over cook items. The leave in oven safe style is great. Keeps you from opening an oven or grill and losing all of your heat. The probe leads are long enough to use in a double oven and track multiple dishes. Smart design all around and I feel a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Pair with Phone after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Like the other review said, mine worked perfectly a few times but then stopped pairing with my phone. It's basically just an expensive non-bluetooth thermometer now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Used this to first smoke 8 pork butts....worked great....wish the Bluetooth range was a bit stronger but it did well! Easy to clean....easy to use and APP for it is easy to set up!
customer_reviews.author: Angela Martin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my boss for Christmas and he loves it. It was easy to pair up with his phone and extremely helpful. He fell asleep while the food was cooking and the alarm woke him, ending in the perfectly prepared chicken.
customer_reviews.author: EuroShopper

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! Only used once so can’t speak to durability yet. Did have a weird temp reading on one of the probes (read as cooler than it actually was, and over cooked that a bit), but not so bad as to warrant a return. Just one star off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Beam

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality probes
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of light use, I have 3 out of 5 probes that don't work anymore. The item works great, but without the probes, it's useless. I expected longer life for this. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey J. Generelli

customer_reviews.title: Silicone Probe Ends Melted Below Rated Temperature
customer_reviews.text: This device initially worked very well, but after my third use, the silicone end of the meat probes began to melt on my smoker at 400F, despite the claim that they can withstand 572F. I returned the unit and purchased the Inkbird IBT-4XS, which has all-metal probes. It also uses the same mobile app as the Silipower. It’s a shame the silicone melted, because I love this system otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: love2camp

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store, easy to use. I love the app. I love that I can cook multiple things and ensure I do not over cook anything. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Makes you a BBQ pitmaster
customer_reviews.text: Get the attachment for this unit that measures the grill temperature at the meat level. Works great!!
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: The handle on probe melted from the heat of the grill
customer_reviews.text: The handle on the probe melted from the heat of the grill. They are not meant to be used over 500 degrees.
customer_reviews.author: DJK

customer_reviews.title: Great for Smoker monitoring!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I purchased it for use with my smoker. It is great for that. I use one channel to monitor Smoker temperature and the others for various meats I am smoking. App works perfectly. I now find I use it indoors also when baking meat, like turkeys, roasts, even large casseroles.
customer_reviews.author: Carl McKay

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Seems accurate. Easy to set up and connect. The only downfall is after a few smokes, the silicone insulators get dark and hard to see what colors are what. Good unit however.
customer_reviews.author: VisualSlap

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for making awesome meals
customer_reviews.text: This thermometer has been great. It's very easy to use and I like that I can connect it to my phone. We haven't had a poorly cooked piece of meat since we got this. Everything is cooked perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson

customer_reviews.title: Cant find way to contact seller to replace under 1 yr warranty
customer_reviews.text: I purchased aug 30 2018. Until today, i was very happy with everything. I last used the unit 2 days ago. I grill 1-2x/ week since I bought it. Unit died tonight. There is no option to contact seller to replace under 1 year warranty. Extremely disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this in December of 2018 and it is June 2019. I have used this thermometer about 10 times since I purchased it and it suddenly stopped working. Changed batteries and everything and it’s just done. What a piece of junk
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Is temp reading accurate?
customer_reviews.text: Thermometer keeps temperature well. I used in smoker so silicon covers got discolored but that was expected. Meat was less done then temp indicated but I can adjust for this over usage.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer,work well so far..
customer_reviews.text: Have used it twice now for low and slow smoke sessions totalling 30+ hours. Pairing and setup were easy and the range is great, I've had it about 45 ft. away with walls in between and stayed connected. Temperature reads accurate, and an all around quality product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Halfond

customer_reviews.title: NEED TO DO A BETTER JOB CHECKING THE PRODUCT BEFORE SHIPPING!!
customer_reviews.text: Like the product, but did not get the AA BATTERIES!!
customer_reviews.author: Tommy

customer_reviews.title: Don’t wait
customer_reviews.text: Must have if you smoke meat Nice to be able to kick back and see temps from your phone
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month now and it has helped make some of the best steaks I’ve ever grilled. Phone app is easy to use and lets me walk away from the grill and check temp from back inside the house. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this sooner?!
customer_reviews.text: Used it a couple times. Great to have choices and options of alarms and probes.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for monitoring my smoker temperature at the grate height.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great unit!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this controller for a couple of days now and it is awesome. Easy to use and program...has all the features I need and I haven't had any problems at all. I use for long cooks, quick cooks and everything in between. I highly recommend this unit for grilling perfection!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Gumz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The most awesome remote I have ever got to date
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tennis

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ monitoring system for tracking you cooking progress.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I set t up on my egg and tracked temp nicely. It shows both fire and meat temp. I use mine to monitor the cooking some 70' from our patio. Good meat probes and strong drop protection coverings on both the transmitter and remote.eas to read LCD screens on both units.
customer_reviews.author: George Boudreaux

customer_reviews.title: It's designed well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. It's designed well and easy to operate at a great price! Great for the oven, grill and smoker. Really helps to maintain a proper smoking temp by leaving one probe sit on the rack next to the food. App is user friendly with the ability to setup custom temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Langer

customer_reviews.title: Pick one up
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Use it every time I turn my Traeger on.
customer_reviews.author: Bigroam

customer_reviews.title: Great Wirless Remote Meat Thermometer On The Market
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wireless remote digital thermometer I have ever had the prob that also tells you the temp in the oven or smoker is a added benefit and the guarantee on the probe is outstanding simple the best unit on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia Husband

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Love having it hooked up to my phone via Bluetooth so I can keep an eye on the temperature with going to the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and is extremely handy for the BBQ addict
customer_reviews.text: Use this all the time when BBQing thick steaks or roasts. BBQ is on the front deck, I can do my prep in the kitchen, or sit in the living room and watch the tube in comfort without hovering over the grill or smoker in the hot sun.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Burford

customer_reviews.title: I love having all of the extra probes in case one ...
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding thermometer! I love having all of the extra probes in case one of them goes down. Super easy to use and the accuracy seem to be spot on.
customer_reviews.author: Joe McVay

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to all meat smokers...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well... I use it every time I use my smoker! Very accurate and the bluetooth to my Android Phone works great!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Perisho

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work just fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work just fine. It was purchased for use with the smoker, but it's now an essential kitchen tool as well. I cooked some pretty thick pork chops the other day and they came out fully cooked and juicy.
customer_reviews.author: Aki Fleshler

customer_reviews.title: The is an excellent product. I smoke a turkey every year for ...
customer_reviews.text: The is an excellent product. I smoke a turkey every year for Thanksgiving and with this temp, probe I was able to sit inside with family and friends instead of hanging outside with the smoker. It had great range and did the job I needed it to do. Would recommend to anyone. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Henson

customer_reviews.title: Grilling made easy
customer_reviews.text: I'm no longer a slave when grilling. I can go inside and watch TV. If the temperature rises or goes below a certain temp my transmitter alerts me to check it out. It's easy to use. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: DANIA TALAVERA

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The range is stellar and very useful Update: having used this a few times it is one of the best products I've bought. It's fantastic. The manual is easy and it just works.
customer_reviews.author: Estela Scott

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: The product arrive in good condition, I would of give 5 stars. However, per the owners manual. I was supposed to get some with batteries and it, mine were missing.
customer_reviews.author: F05

customer_reviews.title: Awesome customer service. The thermometer works great!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, I've used it a couple of times and it seems to be spot on, very happy with my purchase. Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: faye fields

customer_reviews.title: Will never cook at wrong temperature again.
customer_reviews.text: Like that I can monitor from the house when smoking brisket.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read and operate.
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to set up, and worked exactly as expected. I was also impressed with the range. We were in the house and had the sensor in the kitchen. Used it on my grill the other day with some tri-tip and it cooked perfectly, beeped when ready. Easy to read and operate.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaKrivenkoff

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I can't easily cook to order with this. Easy to use and accurate. Can set each probe to a different temp.
customer_reviews.author: kslud5

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Colors are difficult to see after using a few times
customer_reviews.author: cable guy

customer_reviews.title: What more can I say- it's a great product and he loves
customer_reviews.text: My husband said this is the greatest thermometer he's every used....since he does a lot of smoking and grilling out, that's a true compliment!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory K Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Its very easy to use. Just wish you could see the graph more than 1 hour intervals
customer_reviews.author: Amos French

customer_reviews.title: Faulty unit.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great until it just stopped working. Used a dozen times and just stopped working
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Item life
customer_reviews.text: Worked once great and now won’t turn on even with new batteries! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wireless feature is great!
customer_reviews.text: Great for leaving my smoker alone and going in the house, I can still monitor the temp of my cook chamber and the meat.
customer_reviews.author: Emil Radanov

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product,it seems to work so far,and there are no problems.
customer_reviews.author: gary kaufman

customer_reviews.title: SMART PHONE BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I do not like the fact that I need to get an app to operate this thing. First the app requires that they have access to my contacts, photo's, etc. In my phone. Without the app you can't even change the temp settings. I'm not happy with the 3 units I ordered and will be returning them unless otherwise corrected..
customer_reviews.author: Mary Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Failed me big time
customer_reviews.text: This looks great but it came up really short. First you need to use the app to program it, temp setting and degree unit. Second the range of this is a joke, it kept disconnecting from my phone as soon as I aalked away. Third and most important is I found this to be about 30 degrees F low. I used 4 probes and they all sait I hit my temp goal on my briskets, pulled them out and rested them. Went to slice and they were no where ready, one brisket was still bleeding even though the probe said I hit 198 when I pulled them out.
customer_reviews.author: Chee Y

customer_reviews.title: If you BBQ you need this.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. However designed it has done lots of meat on a pit and knows all the problems with current thermometers. Futher, unlike previous bluetooth thermometers this connects and reconnects automatically. Pros: 1. Track lots of items (I had pork shoulder, brisket, and chicken going at the same time 2. Good presets you can adjust 3. Can order replacement probes 4. The wire keeper (might be the most unappreciated feature, no longer do I have a drawer of tangled wires 5. Simple and easy to use. The only thing I wish it had was a "stand" for the probe monitoring the pit temp. Old ones I have are too big to hold it securely.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Not built to last
customer_reviews.text: These probes aren't built to last. I love being able to have my phone be an alarm for meat temperature but these probes only seem last for a few uses and then they start displaying oven temperature instead of meat temperature. I've gone through 3 probes in 5 months with once a week usage on average.
customer_reviews.author: C. J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: We have been using this for about a month. ...
customer_reviews.text: We have been using this for about a month. My husband loves it. On Sunday, he cooks 3-4 different meats for the week and this allows him to monitor without having to sit right beside the grill and when the game has his attention, the aural alarm on the app sounds to let him know they are ready, the App works well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this now!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough about this device. I was skeptical based on the price, but it worked perfectly at a family bbq. Ran two ports for a right and left ambient temp, then separate for chicken, chuck, ribs, and brats. It worked flawlessly. After getting it dialed in, it’s the newest addition to all future cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Not Public

customer_reviews.title: RIP
customer_reviews.text: What a great idea! It took the babysitting out of smoking/BBQing. But... exactly 1 year after purchasing this wonderful tool, it died. The batteries were changed but the device wouldn't turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McMeekin

customer_reviews.title: Sensing if off
customer_reviews.text: The sensing is all over the place. I can't trust this. I have to keep opening the smoker to adjust the sensors. falling back to manual sensor
customer_reviews.author: DS

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: My wife have used this on the grill and the oven. She liked it at first, but after five or six uses the probe does not work. So, the good thing is it comes with a number of them; but she has already gone through three.
customer_reviews.author: David Bird

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working after 5 uses. No longer turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Segars

customer_reviews.title: Broke on the 35th day
customer_reviews.text: This item broke on day 35, just after the Amazon return window. I use the oven about 3 times a week. My guess is that this worked for about 12 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Gosh

customer_reviews.title: Its not wireless to probe but is from input box to phone.
customer_reviews.text: I have used it 2 times so far in my egg grill. I used it once with 1 probe and once with 2 probes set at different temperature . In both cases accurate and easy to use. worth the $. Only thing I don't like I haven't found a way to just set your own temperature you have to use their presets
customer_reviews.author: Randy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Used it twice for smoking beef short ribs for about 10 hours. No problems at all. I wish it had the ability to keep graphing the temps when not connected to your phone with the app running. If you close out of the app you lose the graph.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stand up to abuse real tool
customer_reviews.text: I use this thing daily in my BBQ business, it stays outdoors in the weather all year round. Never fail d me yet. Can't wait to buy another
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I like that it has a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like that it has a great display that can be used when you are at the Grill. Works great with the application on my phone. It has great range : I can be inside the house and still monitor my grill !!
customer_reviews.author: ABV

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband for Christmas. He uses it all the time with the smoker. Says it is easy to use, easy to read and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Riverrat

customer_reviews.title: Delivered amazing meat time after time.
customer_reviews.text: I smoke and grill about twice a month. This is my first ever grilling thermometer but it works great. Hooks up to your phone via the app and works well with it too.
customer_reviews.author: K. Dewop

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Love the tailored alerts that tell you when meat is done. Would like other alternatives to the shrill alarm.
customer_reviews.author: CLG

customer_reviews.title: These are really awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Received in good condition. These are the bomb. Set up using your smart phone and when your alarm goes off you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Nels A. Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I tested each probe and connection to iPhone. Works fine. Will be testing in the smoker soon and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Phil b

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: wi-fi/phone app was easy. I made 4 chuck roasts in my smoker and couldn't ask for more.
customer_reviews.author: Caspian

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: Originally I wrote that this item didn't work but I just realized that the manufacturer setting was for Celsius and not Fahrenheit. Once I realized this it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: Flawless easy interface with my iPhone and works as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Adam T

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly, simple and easy to use, nice not having to run in and out of the house. Excellent for BBQ!
customer_reviews.author: lempereur

product_meta.title: Meat Thermometer, Silipower Bluetooth Grilling Cooking Food Thermometer with 6 Probes, Wireless Remote Digital Thermometer for Oven Kitchen Smoker BBQ
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

CE/FCC Certified & 1Year Warranty 
Backed with CE/FCC certification and a 1-year warranty, a brand-new sensor probe will be provided if your probe experience temperature reading problems, free of charge.

Smart Cooking Thermometer - Open your phone, Cook Like A Pro 
Wireless Food Thermometer connected phone/tablet by Bluetooth help you to monitor your food from anywhere and anytime. Set the type of food and your desired doneness then enjoy the rest of the movie, your phone will alarm you once the food is ready.

Wide Compatibility
The free APP is widely compatible with IOS and Android phones, supports iPad, iPhone, iPod, other iOS devices and Android 4.3 or later devices.

 User-friendly Design
3-inch LCD Backlit Screen shows accurate temperature results in about 3 seconds. 4" food grade stainless steel probe keeps you from burning your hands while measuring. 48" reinforced stainless steel mesh cable, ensures the thermometer won't get splashed by oil or liquid.

Features: 
1. Supports up to 6 probes
2. Programmed with USDA approved preset temperatures for 11types of food 
3. Programmed with USDA approved doneness levels(Rare, Medium, Medium Well and Well Done) 
4. Program your own temperature settings manually 
5. Programmed with timer 
6. Temperature history graph
7. Ringtone or vibration alarm 
8. Large LCD screen display

Specification:
Remote Range: Indoor 100ft, Outdoor 170ft (may vary depending on the surroundings)
Temperature Range: -58°F to 572°F
Temperature Accuracy: ±1°F
Powered by: 2* AA batteries
Temp Conversion: °F & ¡æ
Temp Display: LCD Screen & App Synchronously 

Package Contents: 
1 x Meat Thermometer
6 x Probes with Racks(Please REMOVE the Rack from probe before use)
6 x Probe Wraps
1 x Manual
feature_bullets: Smart Meat Thermometer: Stop standing around, boringly, to check on the temperature of your food, feel free to watch TV or do chores when cooking as you can get instant notifications through your phone. Using the smart free App, you will get temperature readings on your phone via Bluetooth with a range of up to 170ft.

Preset Temperature and Timer: Grill thermometer has preset temperatures for 11 types of food and their various cooking levels recommended by USDA. Includes Beef, Veal, Lamb, Chicken, Pork, Fish, Turkey, Hamburger,etc., You can also customize the temperatures and timer to suit your personal taste.

Up to Six Probes: This wireless cooking thermometer allows you to monitor six different foods or read grill/oven/smoker surrounding temperature at the same time. Temperature measurement range from 32°F to 572°F. With 6 different color-marked probes, get instant readings on different types of meat simultaneously.

Make Cooking Easier: Set the type of food and your preferred doneness level, both the Bluetooth digital thermometer and your phone will beep when your meat is cooked to perfection. Stop worry about overcooking or undercooking again.

Accurate Readings: BBQ Thermometer delivers a +/-1% accuracy level to ensure precise temperatures each time. Designed with a 3-inch LCD backlit screen makes reading easier. This Wireless Meat Thermometer will help you to cook more professionally.
